text.text: So, you want to store your extra parts in a special chest, eh? If not, too bad you have the option anyway.

Part chests allow you to store an abundance of extra parts you may have. Each slot can hold a stack of 16 parts max. If you need more than that, you're doing something wrong or have very convoluted recipes.
Modifier chests can be used to store items used for upgrades, abilities, or slotless modifers.
